name: The squirrel rise
description:
Hello world!

This game was made for the Global Game Jam of 2021.
Disclaimer: The game lag and the shader bug in navigator.
Theme: Lost and found.

How to play:
Touch an acorn to take it. It's a simple collectible. Jump on an enemy to kill them. Recover the colors of life to win. There are 3 different endings!

Controls:
Keaboard, controller and mouse can be used. WAQS, arrows, joysticks or click and scroll to move and jump. ESCAPE, Start or middle click to pause. Choose between keaboard, controller and mouse.
